name: nem-sdk
description: NEM Developer Kit for Node.js and the browser

scripts.browserify: mkdir -p dist && browserify -r through -r duplexer -r ./build/index.js:nem-sdk > dist/nem-sdk.js
scripts.version: npm run build && npm run browserify && npm run minify && git add -A dist/
scripts.postversion: git push origin master && git push --tags
